text:
@WhiteHouse @GOPLeader Chen Wang, Peter W Horby, Frederick G Hayden,
George F Gao, "A NOVEL CORONAVIRUS OUTBREAK OF GLOBAL HEALTH CONCERN," Jan 24, 2020 warned of "human-to-human transmission," "the risk of much wider spread of the disease" and said "the time to act is now." Trump cried "hoax" Feb 28.
